text: The 1st constituency of Gard is a French legislative constituency in the Gard département. It consists of the (pre-2015) cantons of Beaucaire, Nîmes 1, 3 and 6 and Vistrenque. ==Deputies== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | | 1988
